data.text: Liban bɔxɔna, i ya dɛɛne rabi.
Alatala n ma Ala naxa iki:
Amasɔtɔ n mi fa kininkininma yamanan muxune ma,”
Nayi, n yi xuruse kuru faxa daxin naba, katarabi xuruse tɔrɔxine ma. N yi dungan firin tongo. N yi keden xili sa “Fanna,” bonna “Lanna.” N yi xuruse kurun naba.
N yi xuruse raba saxan kedi kike kedenna bun. Diɲan yi ɲan n yi, n fan yi raɲaxu xuruseene ma.
Nayi, n yi a fala ne xa, n naxa, “N mi fa ɛ rabama. Xa naxan faxama, a xa faxa. Xa naxan lɔma ayi, a xa lɔ ayi. Naxanye na lu, ne xa e bode suben don.”
N yi n ma fanna dunganna tongo n yi a yigira, alogo n xa n ma layirin kala n naxan xidi nxu nun siyane birin tagi.
A yi kala na lɔxɔni, nayi xuruse tɔrɔxin naxanye yi n matoma na lɔxɔni, ne yi a kolon a Alatalaa falan nan yi a ra.
N yi a fala e xa, n naxa, “Xa a ɛ kɛnɛn, ɛ n saranna fi, xanamu, ɛ a lu na.” E yi gbeti gbanan tonge saxan fi n saranna ra.
Alatala yi a fala n xa, a naxa, “A wolɛ ayi fɛɲɛ rafalan xa, e saran gbeeni ito naxan mirixi n xa.” N yi gbeti gbanan tonge saxanna tongo, n yi e woli Alatala banxini fɛɲɛ rafalan xa.
Na xanbi ra, n yi n ma lan dunganna fan yigira alogo n xa ngaxakedenyaan kala Yuda nun Isirayila tagi.
Alatala yi a fala n xa, a naxa, “I mɔn xa xuruse raba xaxilitarena waliseene tongo.

Amasɔtɔ n tan yɛtɛɛn xuruse rabana nde rafama nɛn yamanani. A mi a yengi dɔxɛ xuruseene xɔn ma naxanye lɔma ayi, a mi a dii xali nɛnɛne fenɲɛ, a mi a maxɔlɔxine dandanɲɛ, a mi a kɛndɛne baloɛ. Koni a yɛxɛɛ turaxine donma nɛn a yi e toron koten.”
Gbalon na xuruse raba fuyantenna xa,
